page.title: 06MY WEEKEND BY EMMA LONDON .
page.content: ON FRIDAY EVENING I WENT TO DOVERCOURT SWIMMING POOL WITH JAMES HOCKLEY AND HIS MUM.ON SATURDAY MORNING I WENT TO MY MODERN DANCING CLASS IN DOVERCOURT. ON SATURDAY AFTERNOON MY AUNTIE,UNCLE AND NANNA TOOK ME TO SUDBURY IN SUFFOLK. ON SATURDAY EVENING I WENT TO THE V.E. DAY CELEBRATION WITH MY AUNTIE AND UNCLE AT WRABNESS VILLAGE HALL.PEOPLE DRESSED UP IN 1940'S COSTUME AND THERE WAS SINGING AND DANCING.ON SATURDAY NIGHT I SLEPT AT MY AUNTIES. ON SUNDAY MORNING I WENT TO SEE MY COUSIN AND TOOK HER DOG FOR A WALK.ON SUNDAY AFTERNOON I PLAYED WITH SOME GAMES I HAD TAKEN TO MY AUNTIES.ON SUNDAY EVENING I WENT TO TEA AT MY NANNAS AND SO DID MY AUNTIE AND UNCLE.
